nodes.title: Web Based IDE for VS Code
nodes.summary: a web based IDE that run VS Code

product.summary: An integrated product that unifies issues, code review, CI and CD into a single UI

overview.overview: code-server is a web based IDE, it help you run VS Code on any machine anywhere and access it in the browser.

highlights: Code on any device with a consistent development environment
Use cloud servers to speed up tests, compilations, downloads, and more
all intensive tasks run on your server

childMarkdownRemark.html: This is a repackaged code server with professional support for your business. Code server is a web based IDE that help you run Visual Studio Code on any machine anywhere and access it in the browser. It is also server-powered that take advantage of large cloud servers to speed up tests, compilations, downloads, and more.

faq.key: code-server 容器默认已经运行 Node, Yarn, Git等工具，可以很方便的配合 code-server 进行 Node 相关程序的开发。
